prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Organ, Guitar, Synth Lead, and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Piano, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
No Bass is present in this song, but it does include Organ, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Piano.
